Text: THANKS A LOT! and i mean it, A LOT. you ripped it too fast :)

I had plenty of time, but I wanted a source with the original AR [1,85:1] not 16:9. But ... Proper 1080p Amiable wasn't available !

So...the best available was:
 The Talented Mr Ripley (1999) 1080p Blu-ray DTS x264-CHD

For a proper QF [quality factor] [ Bits/(Pixel*Frame) = 0.113 ]  I had to go to 2,8Gib and this way minimum video bit rate was 2500 kbps.

Enjoy!
